ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dragon Slaying
ygData.msgSnippet: Jack up your resist gear & go on raids in your low 40s/up as a warrior The first Naggie/Vox runs in the old days were done with *ALL* lower 40s...don t let
ygData.messageBody:
Jack up your resist gear & go on raids in your low 40s/up as a warrior

The first Naggie/Vox runs in the old days were done with *ALL* lower
40s...don't let other people's conservatism set you back. Tactics matter
more than lvls with the jr dragons

Flair Shieldrender
54 Champion Fennin Ro

Stacey wrote:

> What level do you people think should start going
> on dragon raids? The main levels that are best,
> I've heard, are levels 35 - 50, but I'd like your
> input as a lot of people have been telling me to
> wait until levels 46 - 50 before I even go on my
> first one. Any input would be well appreciated.
> Thank you.
>
